A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a huge Star Wars fan\, I liked this movie. I have to say it is in my top 3 favorites. There have been a ton of negative reviews and a lot of fan backlash about this movie. I feel that as much as anything this is because the writers and directors and Disney did not ask the fans to write and direct the movie. Everyone who ever had an opinion about how this movie should go or a theory of their own was massively dissapointed. None of it happened. I say forget what you thought should have happened and go watch it again\, you might just realize its better than you thought. Sure there are parts that could be better and things that i wish didnt happen\, but all in all I think this is a great Star Wars movie.
